column2: As a researcher I want to upload...
As a researcher I want a full provenance...
As an imaging tech I want automatic motion correction...
As a clinician I want cone density maps...
As a labeler I want to edit a mask...
As a labeler I want active-learning tiles...
As a reviewer I want multi-rater adjudication...
As an ML engineer I want to register a model...
As an ML engineer I want canary deploys...
As an ML engineer I want drift alerts...
As an admin I want SSO + RBAC...
As an auditor I want complete access logs...
As a data manager I want PHI de-identification...
As a PI I want cohort exports...
As QA I want a golden-case suite...
